issue.title: [Crossbow] Ensure that the locally generated version is used in the docker tasks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8362](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8362). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow fork might not have the version tags, so the scm based version generation can't work. 

Pass the locally detected version to the docker builds.
